Description:
Roles & Responsibilities:Listening to customers' wants and helping them find the perfect product for their needs.
Constantly building product knowledge and delivering this knowledge in engaging ways.
Setting up attractive product displays and promotional booths.
Engaging in meaningful interactions and building good relationships with customers.
Meeting daily targets and submitting sales reports.Skills
Skills:
1 Years of working experience in Sales in UAE
Strong negotiation skill
Must have worked in consumer durable industry.
